com.w2.api.engine.components.commands

Class BodyWheels

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w2.api.engine.components.commands.BodyWheels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotCommand, RobotComponent

    public final class BodyWheels
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotCommand
    BodyWheels objects instruct a Robot how to move by specifying the velocity for each wheel.

    Valid wheel velocity values range from -100 to 100 cm/s. However, actual speed might vary based on surface conditions (e.g., carpet speed will be slower).
